timeline.message: doc: Update netex import documentation with collaboration and package diagrams and more doc.
Clean code: Move ServiceIdFactory to support package.
Clean code: Make all NetexMappers package local, except he main one.
Clean code: Rename dayOfWeek to dayOfWeeks (take a list of elements, not just one element).

timeline.bodyText: Allow some data to be shared, and group other data together. Each group should be isolated from other groups. This enable multi-threading, processing groups in separate threads.
timeline.author: t2gran
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,6 +14,19 @@ data quality should be fixed BEFORE loading the data into OTP. OTP will try to _
 data, allowing the rest to be imported. 
 
 
+## Design Goals
+
+- Import Transit data from NeTEx xml-files
+- Handle large input file sets (10 GB)
+- Allow some data to be shared and group other data together is an isolated scope

timeline.author: gmellemstrand
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,6 +14,19 @@ data quality should be fixed BEFORE loading the data into OTP. OTP will try to _
 data, allowing the rest to be imported. 
 
 
+## Design Goals
+
+- Import Transit data from NeTEx xml-files
+- Handle large input file sets (10 GB)
+- Allow some data to be shared and group other data together is an isolated scope 
+- Support for reading data fast, multi-threaded (the design support this, but not implemented jet)   
+- Warn or report issues on poor data, but keep building a graph so one "bad" line do not block the 
+  entire import.
+- The import should put any restrictions on the order of XML types in the files. If ServiceJourney
